for-direction.name: for-direction
for-direction.description: 禁止 for 循环出现方向错误的循环，比如 for (i = 0; i < 10; i--)
for-direction.badExample: for (let i = 0; i < 10; i--) { // do something }
for-direction.goodExample: for (let i = 0; i < 10; i++) { // do something }

getter-return.name: getter-return
getter-return.description: getter 必须有返回值，并且禁止返回空，比如 return;
getter-return.badExample: let user = { get name() { // 无返回值 } }; class User { get name() { // 返回空 return; } }
getter-return.goodExample: let user = { get name() { return 'Alex'; } }; class User { get name() { return this.name; } }

no-async-promise-executor.name: no-async-promise-executor
no-async-promise-executor.description: 禁止将 async 函数做为 new Promise 的回调函数
no-async-promise-executor.badExample: new Promise(async (resolve) => { setTimeout(resolve, 1000); });
no-async-promise-executor.goodExample: new Promise((resolve) => { setTimeout(resolve, 1000); });
no-async-promise-executor.reason: 出现这种情况时，一般不需要使用 new Promise 实现异步了

no-await-in-loop.name: no-await-in-loop
no-await-in-loop.description: 禁止将 await 写在循环里，因为这样就无法同时发送多个异步请求了
no-await-in-loop.reason: 要求太严格了，有时需要在循环中写 await

no-compare-neg-zero.name: no-compare-neg-zero
no-compare-neg-zero.badExample: if (foo === -0) { // do something }
no-compare-neg-zero.goodExample: if (foo === 0) { // do something }

no-cond-assign.name: no-cond-assign
no-cond-assign.description: 禁止在测试表达式中使用赋值语句，除非这个赋值语句被括号包起来了
no-cond-assign.badExample: // 这可能是把 === 误写成了 = if (foo = 0) { // do something }
no-cond-assign.goodExample: if (foo === 0) { // do something } if (bar === (foo = 0)) { // do something }

no-constant-condition.name: no-constant-condition
no-constant-condition.description: 禁止将常量作为分支条件判断中的测试表达式，但允许作为循环条件判断中的测试表达式
no-constant-condition.badExample: if (true) { console.log('true'); } const foo = 0 ? 'bar' : 'baz';
no-constant-condition.goodExample: for (;true;) { if (foo === 0) break; } while (true) { if (foo === 0) break; }

no-control-regex.name: no-control-regex
no-control-regex.description: 禁止在正则表达式中出现 Ctrl 键的 ASCII 表示，即禁止使用 /\x1f/
no-control-regex.reason: 几乎不会遇到这种场景

no-debugger.name: no-debugger
no-debugger.badExample: if (foo) { debugger; }
no-debugger.goodExample: if (foo) { // debugger; }

no-dupe-args.name: no-dupe-args
no-dupe-args.description: 禁止在函数参数中出现重复名称的参数
no-dupe-args.reason: 使用 babel 时，在编译阶段就会报错了

no-dupe-keys.name: no-dupe-keys
no-dupe-keys.description: 禁止在对象字面量中出现重复名称的键名
no-dupe-keys.badExample: let foo = { bar: 1, bar: 2 };
no-dupe-keys.goodExample: let foo = { bar: 1, baz: 2 };

no-duplicate-case.name: no-duplicate-case
no-duplicate-case.description: 禁止在 switch 语句中出现重复测试表达式的 case
no-duplicate-case.badExample: switch (foo) { case 1: break; case 2: break; case 1: break; }
no-duplicate-case.goodExample: switch (foo) { case 1: break; case 2: break; case 3: break; }

no-empty.name: no-empty
no-empty.description: 禁止出现空代码块，允许 catch 为空代码块
no-empty.badExample: if (foo) { }
no-empty.goodExample: if (foo) { // do something }

no-empty-character-class.name: no-empty-character-class
no-empty-character-class.description: 禁止在正则表达式中使用空的字符集 []
no-empty-character-class.badExample: let reg = /abc[]/;
no-empty-character-class.goodExample: let reg = /abc[a-z]/;

no-ex-assign.name: no-ex-assign
no-ex-assign.description: 禁止将 catch 的第一个参数 error 重新赋值
no-ex-assign.badExample: try { // do something } catch (e) { e = 10; }
no-ex-assign.goodExample: try { // do something } catch (e) { console.error(e); }

no-extra-boolean-cast.name: no-extra-boolean-cast
no-extra-boolean-cast.description: 禁止不必要的布尔类型转换，比如 !! 或 Boolean
no-extra-boolean-cast.badExample: if (!!foo) { // do something } if (Boolean(foo)) { // do something }
no-extra-boolean-cast.goodExample: if (foo) { // do something }

no-extra-parens.name: no-extra-parens
no-extra-parens.description: 禁止函数表达式中出现多余的括号
no-extra-parens.badExample: let foo = (function () { return 1 });
no-extra-parens.goodExample: let foo = function () { return 1 }; let bar = (a * b) + c;

no-extra-semi.name: no-extra-semi
no-extra-semi.badExample: let foo = 1;; function bar() { // do something };
no-extra-semi.goodExample: let foo = 1; function bar() { // do something }

no-func-assign.name: no-func-assign
no-func-assign.description: 禁止将一个函数声明重新赋值，如：
no-func-assign.badExample: function foo() { // do something } foo = 1;
no-func-assign.goodExample: let foo = function() { // do something }; foo = 1;

no-inner-declarations.name: no-inner-declarations
no-inner-declarations.description: 禁止在 if 代码块内出现函数声明
no-inner-declarations.badExample: if (foo) { function bar() { // do something } }
no-inner-declarations.goodExample: if (foo) { let bar = function () { // do something }; }

no-invalid-regexp.name: no-invalid-regexp
no-invalid-regexp.description: 禁止在 RegExp 构造函数中出现非法的正则表达式
no-invalid-regexp.badExample: let reg1 = new RegExp('['); let reg2 = new RegExp('.', 'z');
no-invalid-regexp.goodExample: let reg1 = new RegExp('[a-z]'); let reg2 = new RegExp('.', 'g');

no-irregular-whitespace.name: no-irregular-whitespace
no-irregular-whitespace.description: 禁止使用特殊空白符（比如全角空格），除非是出现在字符串、正则表达式或模版字符串中
no-irregular-whitespace.badExample: function foo()　{ // do something }
no-irregular-whitespace.goodExample: let foo = '　'; let bar = /　/; let baz = `　`;

no-misleading-character-class.name: no-misleading-character-class
no-misleading-character-class.description: 禁止正则表达式中使用肉眼无法区分的特殊字符
no-misleading-character-class.badExample: /^[Á]$/u.test('Á'); // false
no-misleading-character-class.goodExample: /^[A]$/u.test('A'); // true
no-misleading-character-class.reason: 某些特殊字符很难看出差异，最好不要在正则中使用

no-obj-calls.name: no-obj-calls
no-obj-calls.description: 禁止将 Math, JSON 或 Reflect 直接作为函数调用
no-obj-calls.badExample: let foo = Math(); let bar = JSON(); let baz = Reflect();
no-obj-calls.goodExample: let foo = Math.random(); let bar = JSON.parse('{}'); let baz = Reflect.get({ x: 1, y: 2 }, 'x');

no-prototype-builtins.name: no-prototype-builtins
no-prototype-builtins.description: 禁止使用 hasOwnProperty, isPrototypeOf 或 propertyIsEnumerable

no-regex-spaces.name: no-regex-spaces
no-regex-spaces.description: 禁止在正则表达式中出现连续的空格，必须使用 /foo {3}bar/ 代替
no-regex-spaces.badExample: let reg1 = /foo bar/; let reg2 = new RegExp('foo bar');
no-regex-spaces.goodExample: let reg1 = /foo {3}bar/; let reg2 = new RegExp('foo {3}bar');

no-sparse-arrays.name: no-sparse-arrays
no-sparse-arrays.description: 禁止在数组中出现连续的逗号，如 let foo = [,,]
no-sparse-arrays.badExample: let foo = [1, 2,, 3];
no-sparse-arrays.goodExample: let foo = [1, 2, 3];

no-template-curly-in-string.name: no-template-curly-in-string
no-template-curly-in-string.description: 禁止在普通字符串中出现模版字符串里的变量形式，如 'Hello ${name}!'
no-template-curly-in-string.badExample: let foo = 'Hello ${bar}';
no-template-curly-in-string.goodExample: let foo = 'Hello {bar}';

no-unexpected-multiline.name: no-unexpected-multiline
no-unexpected-multiline.description: 禁止出现难以理解的多行表达式
no-unexpected-multiline.badExample: let foo = bar [1, 2, 3].forEach(baz);
no-unexpected-multiline.goodExample: let foo1 = bar[1].forEach(baz); let foo2 = bar; [1, 2, 3].forEach(baz);

no-unreachable.name: no-unreachable
no-unreachable.description: 禁止在 return, throw, break 或 continue 之后还有代码
no-unreachable.badExample: function foo() { return; let bar = 1; }
no-unreachable.goodExample: function foo() { return; // let bar = 1; }

no-unsafe-finally.name: no-unsafe-finally
no-unsafe-finally.description: 禁止在 finally 中出现 return, throw, break 或 continue
no-unsafe-finally.badExample: function foo() { try { return 1; } finally { // finally 会在 try 之前执行，故会 return 2 return 2; } }
no-unsafe-finally.goodExample: function foo() { try { return 1; } finally { console.log(2); } }

no-unsafe-negation.name: no-unsafe-negation
no-unsafe-negation.description: 禁止在 in 或 instanceof 操作符的左侧使用感叹号，如 if (!key in object)
no-unsafe-negation.badExample: if (!key in object) { // do something } if (!obj instanceof SomeClass) { // do something }
no-unsafe-negation.goodExample: if (!(key in object)) { // do something } if (!(obj instanceof SomeClass)) { // do something }

require-atomic-updates.name: require-atomic-updates
require-atomic-updates.description: 禁止将 await 或 yield 的结果做为运算符的后面项
require-atomic-updates.badExample: async function foo() { result += await somethingElse; result = result + await somethingElse; }
require-atomic-updates.goodExample: async function foo() { result = await somethingElse + result; }
require-atomic-updates.reason: 这样会导致不符合预期的结果

use-isnan.name: use-isnan
use-isnan.description: 必须使用 isNaN(foo) 而不是 foo === NaN
use-isnan.badExample: if (foo === NaN) { // do something }
use-isnan.goodExample: if (isNaN(foo)) { // do something }

valid-typeof.name: valid-typeof
valid-typeof.description: typeof 表达式比较的对象必须是 'undefined', 'object', 'boolean', 'number', 'string', 'function' 或 'symbol'
valid-typeof.badExample: if (typeof foo === 'numbe') { // do something }
valid-typeof.goodExample: if (typeof foo === 'number') { // do something }

accessor-pairs.name: accessor-pairs
accessor-pairs.description: setter 必须有对应的 getter，getter 可以没有对应的 setter
accessor-pairs.badExample: const foo = { set bar(value) { return 'bar ' + value; } };
accessor-pairs.goodExample: const foo = { set bar(value) { this.barValue = 'bar ' + value; }, get bar() { return this.barValue; } }; const bar = { get foo() { return this.fooValue; } };

array-callback-return.name: array-callback-return
array-callback-return.description: 数组的方法除了 forEach 之外，回调函数必须有返回值
array-callback-return.badExample: let foo = [1, 2, 3].map((num) => { console.log(num * num); });
array-callback-return.goodExample: let foo = [1, 2, 3].map((num) => { return num * num; });

block-scoped-var.name: block-scoped-var
block-scoped-var.description: 将 var 定义的变量视为块作用域，禁止在块外使用
block-scoped-var.badExample: if (foo) { var bar = 1; } console.log(bar);
block-scoped-var.goodExample: let bar; if (foo) { bar = 1; } console.log(bar);

class-methods-use-this.name: class-methods-use-this
class-methods-use-this.description: 在类的非静态方法中，必须存在对 this 的引用

complexity.name: complexity
complexity.description: 禁止函数的循环复杂度超过 20，https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cyclomatic_complexity
complexity.badExample: function foo() { let i; if (i === 1) console.log(i); if (i === 2) console.log(i); if (i === 3) console.log(i); if (i === 4) console.log(i); if (i === 5) console.log(i); if (i === 6) console.log(i); if (i === 7) console.log(i); if (i === 8) console.log(i); if (i === 9) console.log(i); if (i === 10) console.log(i); if (i === 11) console.log(i); if (i === 12) console.log(i); if (i === 13) console.log(i); if (i === 14) console.log(i); if (i === 15) console.log(i); if (i === 16) console.log(i); if (i === 17) console.log(i); if (i === 18) console.log(i); if (i === 19) console.log(i); if (i === 20) console.log(i); }
complexity.goodExample: function foo() { let i; if (i === 1) console.log(i); if (i === 2) console.log(i); if (i === 3) console.log(i); if (i === 4) console.log(i); if (i === 5) console.log(i); if (i === 6) console.log(i); if (i === 7) console.log(i); if (i === 8) console.log(i); if (i === 9) console.log(i); if (i === 10) console.log(i); bar(i); } function bar(i) { if (i === 11) console.log(i); if (i === 12) console.log(i); if (i === 13) console.log(i); if (i === 14) console.log(i); if (i === 15) console.log(i); if (i === 16) console.log(i); if (i === 17) console.log(i); if (i === 18) console.log(i); if (i === 19) console.log(i); if (i === 20) console.log(i); }

consistent-return.name: consistent-return
consistent-return.description: 禁止函数在不同分支返回不同类型的值

curly.name: curly
curly.description: if 后面必须要有 {，除非是单行 if
curly.badExample: if (foo) console.log(foo);
curly.goodExample: if (foo) { console.log(foo); } if (foo) console.log(foo);

dot-location.name: dot-location
dot-location.description: 链式调用的时候，点号必须放在第二行开头处，禁止放在第一行结尾处
dot-location.badExample: foo(). bar(). baz();
dot-location.goodExample: foo() .bar() .baz();

dot-notation.name: dot-notation
dot-notation.description: 禁止出现 foo['bar']，必须写成 foo.bar
dot-notation.reason: 当需要写一系列属性的时候，可以更统一

eqeqeq.name: eqeqeq
eqeqeq.description: 必须使用 === 或 !==，禁止使用 == 或 !=，与 null 比较时除外
eqeqeq.badExample: if (foo == 1) { console.log('foo is 1'); }
eqeqeq.goodExample: if (foo === 1) { console.log('foo is 1'); } if (foo == null) { console.log('foo is null or undefined'); }

guard-for-in.name: guard-for-in
guard-for-in.description: for in 内部必须有 hasOwnProperty

max-classes-per-file.name: max-classes-per-file
max-classes-per-file.description: 限制一个文件中类的数量

no-caller.name: no-caller
no-caller.description: 禁止使用 caller 或 callee

no-case-declarations.name: no-case-declarations
no-case-declarations.description: switch 的 case 内有变量定义的时候，必须使用大括号将 case 内变成一个代码块

no-div-regex.name: no-div-regex
no-div-regex.description: 禁止在正则表达式中出现形似除法操作符的开头，如 let a = /=foo/
no-div-regex.reason: 有代码高亮的话，在阅读这种代码时，也完全不会产生歧义或理解上的困难

no-else-return.name: no-else-return
no-else-return.description: 禁止在 else 内使用 return，必须改为提前结束
no-else-return.reason: else 中使用 return 可以使代码结构更清晰

no-empty-function.name: no-empty-function
no-empty-function.reason: 有时需要将一个空函数设置为某个项的默认值

no-empty-pattern.name: no-empty-pattern
no-empty-pattern.description: 禁止解构中出现空 {} 或 []

no-eq-null.name: no-eq-null
no-eq-null.description: 禁止使用 foo == null，必须使用 foo === null
no-eq-null.reason: foo == null 比较常用，可以用于判断 foo 不是 undefined 并且不是 null，故允许此写法

no-extra-bind.name: no-extra-bind
no-extra-bind.description: 禁止出现没必要的 bind

no-extra-label.name: no-extra-label
no-extra-label.description: 禁止出现没必要的 label

no-fallthrough.name: no-fallthrough
no-fallthrough.description: switch 的 case 内必须有 break, return 或 throw

no-floating-decimal.name: no-floating-decimal
no-floating-decimal.description: 表示小数时，禁止省略 0，比如 .5

no-implicit-coercion.name: no-implicit-coercion
no-implicit-coercion.description: 禁止使用 !! ~ 等难以理解的运算符，仅允许使用 !!
no-implicit-coercion.badExample: let b = ~foo.indexOf('.'); let n = +foo; let m = 1 * foo; let s = '' + foo; foo += ``;
no-implicit-coercion.goodExample: let b = foo.indexOf('.') !== -1; let n = Number(foo); let m = Number(foo); let s = String(foo); foo = String(foo); let c = !!foo;

no-implicit-globals.name: no-implicit-globals
no-implicit-globals.description: 禁止在全局作用域下定义变量或申明函数

no-implied-eval.name: no-implied-eval
no-implied-eval.description: 禁止在 setTimeout 或 setInterval 中传入字符串，如 setTimeout('alert("Hi!")', 100);

no-invalid-this.name: no-invalid-this
no-invalid-this.description: 禁止在类之外的地方使用 this
no-invalid-this.reason: this 的使用很灵活，事件回调中可以表示当前元素，函数也可以先用 this，等以后被调用的时候再 call

no-lone-blocks.name: no-lone-blocks
no-lone-blocks.description: 禁止使用没必要的 {} 作为代码块

no-loop-func.name: no-loop-func
no-loop-func.description: 禁止在循环内的函数中出现循环体条件语句中定义的变量

no-multi-spaces.name: no-multi-spaces
no-multi-spaces.description: 禁止出现连续的多个空格，除非是注释前，或对齐对象的属性、变量定义、import 等

no-multi-str.name: no-multi-str
no-multi-str.description: 禁止使用 \ 来换行字符串

no-new.name: no-new
no-new.description: 禁止直接 new 一个类而不赋值

no-new-func.name: no-new-func
no-new-func.description: 禁止使用 new Function，比如 let x = new Function("a", "b", "return a + b");

no-new-wrappers.name: no-new-wrappers
no-new-wrappers.description: 禁止使用 new 来生成 String, Number 或 Boolean

no-octal.name: no-octal
no-octal.description: 禁止使用 0 开头的数字表示八进制数

no-octal-escape.name: no-octal-escape
no-octal-escape.description: 禁止使用八进制的转义符

no-param-reassign.name: no-param-reassign
no-param-reassign.description: 禁止对函数的参数重新赋值

no-restricted-properties.name: no-restricted-properties
no-restricted-properties.description: 禁止使用指定的对象属性
no-restricted-properties.reason: 它用于限制某个具体的 api 不能使用

no-return-assign.name: no-return-assign
no-return-assign.description: 禁止在 return 语句里赋值

no-return-await.name: no-return-await
no-return-await.description: 禁止在 return 语句里使用 await

no-script-url.name: no-script-url
no-script-url.reason: 有些场景下还是需要用到这个

no-self-assign.name: no-self-assign
no-self-assign.description: 禁止将自己赋值给自己

no-self-compare.name: no-self-compare
no-self-compare.description: 禁止将自己与自己比较

no-throw-literal.name: no-throw-literal
no-throw-literal.description: 禁止 throw 字面量，必须 throw 一个 Error 对象

no-unmodified-loop-condition.name: no-unmodified-loop-condition
no-unmodified-loop-condition.description: 循环内必须对循环条件的变量有修改

no-useless-call.name: no-useless-call
no-useless-call.description: 禁止出现没必要的 call 或 apply

no-useless-catch.name: no-useless-catch
no-useless-catch.description: 禁止在 catch 中仅仅只是把错误 throw 出去
no-useless-catch.badExample: try { doSomethingThatMightThrow(); } catch (e) { throw e; }
no-useless-catch.goodExample: doSomethingThatMightThrow(); try { doSomethingThatMightThrow(); } catch (e) { doSomethingBeforeRethrow(); throw e; }
no-useless-catch.reason: 这样的 catch 是没有意义的，等价于直接执行 try 里的代码

no-useless-concat.name: no-useless-concat
no-useless-concat.description: 禁止出现没必要的字符串连接

no-useless-escape.name: no-useless-escape
no-useless-escape.description: 禁止出现没必要的转义
no-useless-escape.reason: 转义可以使代码更易懂

no-warning-comments.name: no-warning-comments
no-warning-comments.description: 禁止注释中出现 TODO 和 FIXME

prefer-named-capture-group.name: prefer-named-capture-group
prefer-named-capture-group.description: 使用 ES2018 中的正则表达式命名组
prefer-named-capture-group.reason: 正则表达式已经较难理解了，没必要强制加上命名组

prefer-promise-reject-errors.name: prefer-promise-reject-errors
prefer-promise-reject-errors.description: Promise 的 reject 中必须传入 Error 对象，而不是字面量

radix.name: radix
radix.description: parseInt 必须传入第二个参数

require-await.name: require-await
require-await.description: async 函数中必须存在 await 语句
require-await.goodExample: async function foo() { console.log('foo'); }
require-await.reason: async function 中没有 await 的写法很常见，比如 koa 的示例中就有这种用法

require-unicode-regexp.name: require-unicode-regexp
require-unicode-regexp.description: 正则表达式中必须要加上 u 标志

vars-on-top.name: vars-on-top
vars-on-top.description: var 必须在作用域的最前面
vars-on-top.reason: var 不在最前面也是很常见的用法

wrap-iife.name: wrap-iife
wrap-iife.description: 立即执行的函数必须符合如下格式 (function () { alert('Hello') })()

yoda.name: yoda
yoda.description: 必须使用 if (foo === 5) 而不是 if (5 === foo)

init-declarations.name: init-declarations
init-declarations.description: 变量必须在定义的时候赋值

no-label-var.name: no-label-var
no-label-var.description: 禁止 label 名称与定义过的变量重复

no-restricted-globals.name: no-restricted-globals
no-restricted-globals.description: 禁止使用指定的全局变量
no-restricted-globals.reason: 它用于限制某个具体的变量名不能使用

no-shadow.name: no-shadow
no-shadow.description: 禁止变量名与上层作用域内的定义过的变量重复
no-shadow.reason: 很多时候函数的形参和传参是同名的

no-shadow-restricted-names.name: no-shadow-restricted-names
no-shadow-restricted-names.description: 禁止使用保留字作为变量名

no-undef.name: no-undef
no-undef.description: 禁止使用未定义的变量

no-undef-init.name: no-undef-init
no-undef-init.description: 禁止将 undefined 赋值给变量

no-unused-vars.name: no-unused-vars
no-unused-vars.description: 定义过的变量必须使用

no-use-before-define.name: no-use-before-define
no-use-before-define.description: 变量必须先定义后使用

callback-return.name: callback-return
callback-return.description: callback 之后必须立即 return

global-require.name: global-require
global-require.description: require 必须在全局作用域下

handle-callback-err.name: handle-callback-err
handle-callback-err.description: callback 中的 error 必须被处理

no-mixed-requires.name: no-mixed-requires
no-mixed-requires.description: 相同类型的 require 必须放在一起

no-path-concat.name: no-path-concat
no-path-concat.description: 禁止对 __dirname 或 __filename 使用字符串连接

no-restricted-modules.name: no-restricted-modules
no-restricted-modules.reason: 它用于限制某个具体的模块不能使用

no-sync.name: no-sync
no-sync.description: 禁止使用 node 中的同步的方法，比如 fs.readFileSync

array-bracket-newline.name: array-bracket-newline
array-bracket-newline.description: 配置数组的中括号内前后的换行格式
array-bracket-newline.reason: 配置项无法配制成想要的样子

array-bracket-spacing.name: array-bracket-spacing
array-bracket-spacing.description: 数组的括号内的前后禁止有空格

array-element-newline.name: array-element-newline
array-element-newline.description: 配置数组的元素之间的换行格式
array-element-newline.reason: 允许一行包含多个元素，方便大数量的数组的书写

block-spacing.name: block-spacing
block-spacing.description: 代码块如果在一行内，那么大括号内的首尾必须有空格

brace-style.name: brace-style
brace-style.description: if 与 else 的大括号风格必须一致
brace-style.reason: else 代码块可能前面需要有一行注释

camelcase.name: camelcase
camelcase.description: 变量名必须是 camelcase 风格的
camelcase.reason: 很多 api 或文件名都不是 camelcase

capitalized-comments.name: capitalized-comments
capitalized-comments.description: 注释的首字母必须大写

comma-dangle.name: comma-dangle
comma-dangle.description: 对象的最后一个属性末尾必须有逗号

comma-spacing.name: comma-spacing
comma-spacing.description: 逗号前禁止有空格，逗号后必须要有空格

computed-property-spacing.name: computed-property-spacing
computed-property-spacing.description: 用作对象的计算属性时，中括号内的首尾禁止有空格

eol-last.name: eol-last
eol-last.description: 文件最后一行必须有一个空行

func-call-spacing.name: func-call-spacing
func-call-spacing.description: 函数名和执行它的括号之间禁止有空格

func-name-matching.name: func-name-matching
func-name-matching.description: 函数赋值给变量的时候，函数名必须与变量名一致

func-style.name: func-style
func-style.description: 必须只使用函数声明或只使用函数表达式

function-paren-newline.name: function-paren-newline
function-paren-newline.description: 函数参数要么同在一行要么每行一个
function-paren-newline.badExample: function foo(bar, baz ) {}
function-paren-newline.goodExample: function foo(bar, baz) {} function goo( bar, baz ) {}

id-blacklist.name: id-blacklist
id-blacklist.description: 禁止使用指定的标识符
id-blacklist.reason: 它用于限制某个具体的标识符不能使用

id-length.name: id-length
id-length.reason: 没必要限制变量名长度

id-match.name: id-match
id-match.description: 限制变量名必须匹配指定的正则表达式

implicit-arrow-linebreak.name: implicit-arrow-linebreak
implicit-arrow-linebreak.description: 箭头函数的函数体必须与箭头在同一行
implicit-arrow-linebreak.badExample: (foo) => bar; (foo) => ( bar() );
implicit-arrow-linebreak.goodExample: (foo) => bar; (foo) => ( bar() ); (foo) => { return bar(); }

indent.name: indent
indent.description: 一个缩进必须用四个空格替代
indent.badExample: if (foo) { bar(); } switch(foo){ case 'bar': break; "token punctuation">) { eslint(indent)"> bar(); } switch(foo){ case 'bar': eslint(indent)"> break; case 'baz': break; } let a = foo ? bar : baz ? qux : boop;
indent.goodExample: if (foo) { bar(); } switch(foo){ case 'bar': break; case 'baz': break; } let a = foo ? bar : baz ? qux : boop;

jsx-quotes.name: jsx-quotes
jsx-quotes.description: jsx 中的属性必须用双引号

key-spacing.name: key-spacing
key-spacing.description: 对象字面量中冒号前面禁止有空格，后面必须有空格

keyword-spacing.name: keyword-spacing
keyword-spacing.description: 关键字前后必须有空格

line-comment-position.name: line-comment-position
line-comment-position.description: 单行注释必须写在上一行

linebreak-style.name: linebreak-style
linebreak-style.description: 限制换行符为 LF 或 CRLF

lines-between-class-members.name: lines-between-class-members
lines-between-class-members.description: 类的成员之间是否需要空行
lines-between-class-members.reason: 有时为了紧凑需要挨在一起，有时为了可读性需要空一行

max-depth.name: max-depth
max-depth.description: 代码块嵌套的深度禁止超过 5 层

max-len.name: max-len
max-len.reason: 现在编辑器已经很智能了，不需要限制一行的长度

max-lines.name: max-lines
max-lines.description: 限制一个文件最多的行数

max-lines-per-function.name: max-lines-per-function
max-lines-per-function.description: 限制函数块中的代码行数

max-nested-callbacks.name: max-nested-callbacks
max-nested-callbacks.description: 回调函数嵌套禁止超过 3 层，多了请用 async await 替代

max-params.name: max-params
max-params.description: 函数的参数禁止超过 7 个

max-statements.name: max-statements
max-statements.description: 限制函数块中的语句数量

max-statements-per-line.name: max-statements-per-line
max-statements-per-line.description: 限制一行中的语句数量

multiline-comment-style.name: multiline-comment-style
multiline-comment-style.reason: 能写注释已经不容易了，不需要限制太多

multiline-ternary.name: multiline-ternary
multiline-ternary.description: 三元表达式必须得换行
multiline-ternary.reason: 三元表达式可以随意使用

new-cap.name: new-cap
new-cap.description: new 后面的类名必须首字母大写

new-parens.name: new-parens
new-parens.description: new 后面的类必须有小括号

no-array-constructor.name: no-array-constructor
no-array-constructor.description: 禁止使用 Array 构造函数

no-inline-comments.name: no-inline-comments
no-inline-comments.description: 禁止在代码后添加内联注释

no-lonely-if.name: no-lonely-if
no-lonely-if.description: 禁止 else 中只有一个单独的 if
no-lonely-if.reason: 单独的 if 可以把逻辑表达的更清楚

no-mixed-operators.name: no-mixed-operators
no-mixed-operators.description: 禁止混用不同的操作符，比如 let foo = a && b < 0 || c > 0 || d + 1 === 0
no-mixed-operators.reason: 太严格了，可以由使用者自己去判断如何混用操作符

no-multi-assign.name: no-multi-assign
no-multi-assign.description: 禁止连续赋值，比如 a = b = c = 5

no-multiple-empty-lines.name: no-multiple-empty-lines
no-multiple-empty-lines.description: 禁止出现超过三行的连续空行

no-negated-condition.name: no-negated-condition
no-negated-condition.description: 禁止 if 里面有否定的表达式
no-negated-condition.reason: 否定的表达式可以把逻辑表达的更清楚

no-nested-ternary.name: no-nested-ternary
no-nested-ternary.description: 禁止使用嵌套的三元表达式，比如 a ? b : c ? d : e

no-restricted-syntax.name: no-restricted-syntax
no-restricted-syntax.reason: 它用于限制某个具体的语法不能使用

no-underscore-dangle.name: no-underscore-dangle
no-underscore-dangle.description: 禁止变量名出现下划线
no-underscore-dangle.reason: 下划线在变量名中很常用

no-unneeded-ternary.name: no-unneeded-ternary
no-unneeded-ternary.description: 必须使用 !a 替代 a ? false : true

no-whitespace-before-property.name: no-whitespace-before-property
no-whitespace-before-property.description: 禁止属性前有空格，比如 foo. bar()

nonblock-statement-body-position.name: nonblock-statement-body-position
nonblock-statement-body-position.description: 禁止 if 后面不加大括号而写两行代码

object-curly-newline.name: object-curly-newline
object-curly-newline.description: 大括号内的首尾必须有换行

object-curly-spacing.name: object-curly-spacing
object-curly-spacing.description: 对象字面量只有一行时，大括号内的首尾必须有空格
object-curly-spacing.badExample: let foo = ct-curly-spacing)">{foo: 'foo'}; let bar = { foo: { bar: 'bar' } }; let baz = { foo: ['baz']};
object-curly-spacing.goodExample: let foo = { foo: 'foo' }; let bar = { foo: { bar: 'bar' }}; let baz = { foo: ['baz'] };

object-property-newline.name: object-property-newline
object-property-newline.description: 对象字面量内的属性每行必须只有一个

one-var.name: one-var
one-var.description: 禁止变量申明时用逗号一次申明多个

one-var-declaration-per-line.name: one-var-declaration-per-line
one-var-declaration-per-line.description: 变量申明必须每行一个

operator-assignment.name: operator-assignment
operator-assignment.description: 必须使用 x = x + y 而不是 x += y

operator-linebreak.name: operator-linebreak
operator-linebreak.description: 需要换行的时候，操作符必须放在行末
operator-linebreak.reason: 有时放在第二行开始处更易读

padded-blocks.name: padded-blocks
padded-blocks.description: 代码块首尾必须要空行

padding-line-between-statements.name: padding-line-between-statements
padding-line-between-statements.description: 限制语句之间的空行规则，比如变量定义完之后必须要空行

prefer-object-spread.name: prefer-object-spread
prefer-object-spread.badExample: let foo = Object.assign({}, bar);
prefer-object-spread.goodExample: let foo = { ...bar }; // 第一个参数为变量时允许使用 Object.assign Object.assign(foo, baz);

quote-props.name: quote-props
quote-props.description: 对象字面量的键名禁止用引号括起来

quotes.name: quotes
quotes.description: 必须使用单引号，禁止使用双引号

semi-spacing.name: semi-spacing
semi-spacing.description: 一行有多个语句时，分号前面禁止有空格，分号后面必须有空格

semi-style.name: semi-style
semi-style.description: 分号必须写在行尾，禁止在行首出现

sort-keys.name: sort-keys
sort-keys.description: 对象字面量的键名必须排好序

space-before-blocks.name: space-before-blocks
space-before-blocks.description: if, function 等的大括号之前必须要有空格，比如 if (a) {

space-before-function-paren.name: space-before-function-paren
space-before-function-paren.description: 命名函数表达式括号前禁止有空格，箭头函数表达式括号前面必须有一个空格
space-before-function-paren.badExample: function foo () { console.log('foo'); } let bar = ()=>{ console.log('bar'); };
space-before-function-paren.goodExample: function foo() { console.log('foo'); } let bar = () => { console.log('bar'); }; bar = function () { }; bar = function() { };

space-in-parens.name: space-in-parens
space-in-parens.description: 小括号内的首尾禁止有空格

space-infix-ops.name: space-infix-ops
space-infix-ops.description: 操作符左右必须有空格

space-unary-ops.name: space-unary-ops
space-unary-ops.description: new, typeof 等后面必须有空格，++, -- 等禁止有空格

spaced-comment.name: spaced-comment
spaced-comment.description: 注释的斜线或 * 后必须有空格

switch-colon-spacing.name: switch-colon-spacing
switch-colon-spacing.description: case 的冒号前禁止有空格，冒号后必须有空格

template-tag-spacing.name: template-tag-spacing
template-tag-spacing.description: 模版字符串的 tag 之后禁止有空格，比如 tag`Hello World`

wrap-regex.name: wrap-regex
wrap-regex.description: 正则表达式必须有括号包起来

arrow-body-style.name: arrow-body-style
arrow-body-style.description: 箭头函数能够省略 return 的时候，必须省略，比如必须写成 () => 0，禁止写成 () => { return 0 }
arrow-body-style.reason: 箭头函数的返回值，应该允许灵活设置

arrow-parens.name: arrow-parens
arrow-parens.description: 箭头函数只有一个参数的时候，必须加括号

arrow-spacing.name: arrow-spacing
arrow-spacing.description: 箭头函数的箭头前后必须有空格

generator-star-spacing.name: generator-star-spacing
generator-star-spacing.description: generator 的 * 前面禁止有空格，后面必须有空格

no-class-assign.name: no-class-assign
no-class-assign.description: 禁止对定义过的 class 重新赋值

no-confusing-arrow.name: no-confusing-arrow
no-confusing-arrow.description: 禁止出现难以理解的箭头函数，比如 let x = a => 1 ? 2 : 3
no-confusing-arrow.badExample: let x = foo => a ? 1 : 2;
no-confusing-arrow.goodExample: let x = foo => (a ? 1 : 2); let y = foo => { return a ? 1 : 2 };

no-const-assign.name: no-const-assign
no-const-assign.description: 禁止对使用 const 定义的常量重新赋值

no-duplicate-imports.name: no-duplicate-imports
no-duplicate-imports.description: 禁止重复 import 模块

no-new-symbol.name: no-new-symbol
no-new-symbol.description: 禁止使用 new 来生成 Symbol

no-restricted-imports.name: no-restricted-imports
no-restricted-imports.description: 禁止 import 指定的模块
no-restricted-imports.reason: 它用于限制某个具体的模块不能使用

no-this-before-super.name: no-this-before-super
no-this-before-super.description: 禁止在 super 被调用之前使用 this 或 super

no-useless-computed-key.name: no-useless-computed-key
no-useless-computed-key.description: 禁止出现没必要的计算键名，比如 let a = { ['0']: 0 };

no-useless-constructor.name: no-useless-constructor
no-useless-constructor.description: 禁止出现没必要的 constructor，比如 constructor(value) { super(value) }

no-useless-rename.name: no-useless-rename
no-useless-rename.description: 禁止解构时出现同样名字的的重命名，比如 let { foo: foo } = bar;

no-var.name: no-var
no-var.badExample: var foo = 1;
no-var.goodExample: let foo = 1; const bar = 2;

object-shorthand.name: object-shorthand
object-shorthand.description: 必须使用 a = {b} 而不是 a = {b: b}

prefer-arrow-callback.name: prefer-arrow-callback
prefer-arrow-callback.description: 必须使用箭头函数作为回调

prefer-const.name: prefer-const
prefer-const.description: 申明后不再被修改的变量必须使用 const 来申明

prefer-numeric-literals.name: prefer-numeric-literals
prefer-numeric-literals.description: 必须使用 0b11111011 而不是 parseInt('111110111', 2)

prefer-rest-params.name: prefer-rest-params
prefer-rest-params.description: 必须使用 ...args 而不是 arguments

prefer-spread.name: prefer-spread
prefer-spread.description: 必须使用 ... 而不是 apply，比如 foo(...args)

prefer-template.name: prefer-template
prefer-template.description: 必须使用模版字符串而不是字符串连接

require-yield.name: require-yield
require-yield.description: generator 函数内必须有 yield

symbol-description.name: symbol-description
symbol-description.description: 创建 Symbol 时必须传入参数

yield-star-spacing.name: yield-star-spacing
yield-star-spacing.description: yield* 后面必须要有空格
